page.title: 13LIFE IN NEWNHAM
page.content: Newnham is a very small hamlet.There are no services in the village apart from the church. The most important people in the village are the Farr family. They own most of the farmland around Newnham and a brother and sister own the two largest houses.Some people in the village call Mr. Farr the "guv'nor". Newnham is a very quiet place.If you like living in the countryside it must be ideal.But you need a car or a good bike to get anywhere. Standing in Newnham you would never believe that the busy A1 dual carriageway passes about 1.5 Km. from the hamlet. It is a very traditional farming community though there are a few non-farming families who have moved in.
